articles.title: The House voted to extend PPP for two months. Here's what happens next - CNBC
articles.description:
The PPP Extension Act of 2021 passed the House Tuesday night. 
Next, it goes to the Senate, where it is expected to be approved.
articles.content:
Small businesses got some good news on Tuesday, when the House of Representatives voted to extend the Paycheck Protection Program for two months.
